banner.body-copy: You may experience forks and hash rate fluctuations as the network settles over the next ~15 days.

ludicrousConfirmationDialog.description: लुडिक्रस मोड आपके सिस्टम को अनुत्तरदायी बना सकता है। कृपया पुष्टि करें कि आप लुडिक्रस मोड में माइनिंग शुरू करना चाहते हैं या तारी यूनिवर्स इको मोड में वापस स्विच कर देगा
ludicrousConfirmationDialog.title: लुडिक्रस मोड में स्विच करें?

resume-app-modal.finishing-resume: फिर से शुरू करना समाप्त कर रहा है...

resume-app-modal.resuming-node: नोड को फिर से शुरू कर रहा है...

resume-app-modal.resuming-tor: टोर को फिर से शुरू कर रहा है...

resume-app-modal.syncing-node: नोड को सिंक कर रहा है...
resume-app-modal.title: तारी यूनिवर्स को फिर से शुरू कर रहा है

warmupDialog.copy:
The birth of a proof-of-work network is special. In the early days, the network needs time to stabilize and find its rhythm. We call this the "warm-up phase."
Contributors and early supporters of the Tari network (like exchanges and infrastructure partners) expect the warm-up phase to last about 15 days. After that, the network will transition to a more stable state.
During the warm-up phase, some quirks are normal. You might see block time fluctuations, temporary disconnections, syncing delays, or even short-lived forks that require your node to reconnect to the main chain.
The warm-up phase is a great time to mine because rewards are highest per block. We hope the early days of the Tari network are rewarding for you.
Let the games begin. May the blocks be forever in your favor!
warmupDialog.subtitle: What does this mean exactly?
warmupDialog.title: Warm up phase
